name: Serino - The Expat - Corona Gorda
additionalNotes: The Expat is a superb handmade traditional Cuban-style medium to full bodied cigar.  Featuring a 6th priming oily Habano Oscuro wrapper and Nicaraguan binders and fillers. The result is a solid smoke with dense robust flavors while been smooth and enjoyable and not overpowering with flavors of cedar, chocolate, and oak.  Extremely well made, each cigar is finished with a Pigtail cap and shaggy foot and come in 10-Pack bundles.
